trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to a span of continuous text in a text container that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 公开一些方法和属性，以实现的文本容器中支持的连续文本范围的 UI 自动化客户端访问<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>控件模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> can represent an insertion point, a subset, or all of the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> container.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>可以表示的插入点、 一个子集，或所有中的文本<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>容器。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>

trans-unit.source: Adds to the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到的支持多个的文本容器中的突出显示文本集合中，不连续选择。

trans-unit.source: The text insertion point moves to the area of the new selection.
trans-unit.target: 文本插入点移到新选择的区域。

trans-unit.source: Providing a degenerate text range moves the insertion point.
trans-unit.target: 提供退化文本范围移动插入点。

trans-unit.source: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection*> must have a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 如果文本提供程序不支持多个不连续选择 (即，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection*>的值必须<xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""> </xref>)。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider"></xref> identical to the original <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider"></xref> and inheriting all properties of the original.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider"></xref>等于原始<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider"></xref>并且继承了其原始的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: The new range can be manipulated independently from the original.
trans-unit.target: 新的范围可以从原始独立操作。

trans-unit.source: The new text range.
trans-unit.target: 新的文本范围。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) is never returned.
trans-unit.target: 空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 永远不会返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the span (the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoint to the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoint) of a text range is the same as another text range.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否跨度 ( <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"> </xref>终结点<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>终结点) 的文本范围是另一个文本范围相同。

trans-unit.source: A text range to compare
trans-unit.target: 要比较的文本范围

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the span of both text ranges is identical; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个文本范围的跨度相同;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the range being compared does not come from the same text provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果要比较的范围不是来自同一文本提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that specifies whether two text ranges have identical endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，指定两个文本范围是否具有相同的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoint of the caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>调用方的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The target range for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 比较在目标范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoint of the target.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>的目标终结点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a negative value if the caller's endpoint occurs earlier in the text than the target endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方的端点出现前面的文本中比目标端点，则，返回一个负值。

trans-unit.source: Returns zero if the caller's endpoint is at the same location as the target endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方的终结点位于与目标终结点相同的位置，则返回零。

trans-unit.source: Returns a positive value if the caller's endpoint occurs later in the text than the target endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方的端点在文本中比目标端点后出现，则，返回一个正值。

trans-unit.source: If targetRange is from a different text provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果 targetRange 来自不同的文本提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Expands the text range to the specified text unit.
trans-unit.target: 将文本范围扩展到指定的文本单位。

trans-unit.source: If the range is already an exact quantity of the specified units then it remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定的单位的确切数量范围。 它保持不变。

trans-unit.source: There is a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A> method to execute successfully.
trans-unit.target: 没有一系列步骤涉及顺序幕后<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A>方法才能成功执行。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint, which makes the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint superfluous.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围进行了规范化;也就是说，将文本范围折叠为退化范围，在<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点，这使得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点成为多余。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤是必需的文本范围跨越其中的情况下消除歧义`unit`边界; 例如，"{The U} RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com)文本中嵌入"位置"{"和"}"是文本范围端点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting range is moved backward in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A> to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 生成的范围中向后移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>到所请求的开头`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The range is moved forward or backward in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A> by the requested number of `unit` boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 该区域中向前或向后移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>的请求数`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 然后扩展范围从退化范围状态通过移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>一个所请求的终结点`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: ![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() > [!NOTE] > These steps are necessary since it is common for a screen reader to read out a full word, sentence, or entire paragraph at the insertion point or any virtual cursor position.
trans-unit.target: ![通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整")如何 （） 和 expandtoenclosingunit （） 调整文本范围的示例&1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 这些步骤是必需的因为它是常见的屏幕读取器读取出完整单词、 句子或在插入点或任何虚拟光标位置处的整个段落。

trans-unit.source: ExpandToEnclosingUnit respects both hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: Expandtoenclosingunit 进行尊重隐藏和显示文本。

trans-unit.source: ExpandToEnclosingUnit defers to the next largest <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> supported if the given <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> is not supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 下一步将 expandtoenclosingunit 进行遵从最大<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>支持的如果给定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>控件不支持。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below.
trans-unit.target: 下面列出的顺序，从最小单位到最大值。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The textual unit.
trans-unit.target: 文本单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns a text range subset that has the specified attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定的特性值的文本范围子集。

trans-unit.source: There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏和显示文本之间没有差异。

trans-unit.source: The attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This value must match the type specified for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须匹配的属性指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the last occurring text range should be returned instead of the first; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果最后一个匹配的文本范围应返回而不是第一个;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A text range having a matching attribute and attribute value; otherwise null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 具有匹配特性和属性值，则为文本范围否则为 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: Returns a text range subset that contains the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含指定的文本的文本范围子集。

trans-unit.source: There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏和显示文本之间没有差异。

trans-unit.source: The text string to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the last occurring text range should be returned instead of the first; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果最后一个匹配的文本范围应返回而不是第一个;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if case should be ignored; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应该忽略大小写;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A text range matching the specified text; otherwise null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 指定的文本; 匹配的文本范围否则为 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified attribute across the text range.
trans-unit.target: 检索整个文本范围的指定属性的值。

trans-unit.source: There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏和显示文本之间没有差异。

trans-unit.source: The text attribute.
trans-unit.target: 文本特性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object representing the value of the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 检索表示指定的属性的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute)` would return a string that represents the font name of the text range while `GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute)` would return a value of type <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute)`将返回表示文本范围时的字体名称的字符串`GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute)`返回的值类型<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue"></xref> if the value of the specified attribute varies over the text range.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue"></xref>如果在文本范围内的指定属性的值会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported"></xref> if the specified attribute is not supported by the provider or the control.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.NotSupported"></xref>如果提供程序或控件不支持指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the specified attribute is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of bounding rectangles for each fully or partially visible line of text in a text range.
trans-unit.target: 检索文本范围中的文本的每个完全或部分可见的行个边框组成的集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of bounding rectangles for each full or partial line of text in a text range.
trans-unit.target: 边框的文本范围中的文本每整个或部分行组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: An empty array for a degenerate range.
trans-unit.target: 退化范围为一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: An empty array for a text range that has screen coordinates placing it completely off-screen, scrolled out of view, or obscured by an overlapping window.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围具有其屏幕坐标完全位于屏幕之外，为一个空数组滚动到视图中，或者被某个重叠窗口遮盖住。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of all embedded objects that fall within the text range.
trans-unit.target: 检索文本范围内的所有嵌入对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of child objects that fall within the range.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围内的子对象集合。

trans-unit.source: Children that overlap with the text range but are not entirely enclosed by it will also be included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 与文本范围发生重叠但是并未完全包括由它的子对象也会包括在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty collection if there are no child objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何子对象，则返回一个空集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the innermost control that encloses the text range.
trans-unit.target: 返回结束文本范围的最内层控件。

trans-unit.source: The enclosing control, typically the text provider that supplies the text range.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件，通常的文本提供程序提供该文本范围。

trans-unit.source: However, if the text provider supports child elements such as tables or hyperlinks, then the enclosing element could be a descendant of the text provider.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果文本提供程序支持表格或超链接这样的子元素，那么包含元素可能为文本提供程序的子代。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the plain text of the range.
trans-unit.target: 检索范围的纯文本。

trans-unit.source: GetText respects both hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: GetText 尊重隐藏和显示文本。

trans-unit.source: If `maxLength` is greater than the length of the text span of the caller, the string returned will be the plain text of the text range.
trans-unit.target: 如果`maxLength`大于长度的调用方的文本范围内，返回的字符串将文本范围的纯文本。

trans-unit.source: GetText will not be affected by the order of endpoints in the text flow; it will always return the text between the Start and End endpoints of the text range in the logical text flow order.
trans-unit.target: GetText 将不受影响的文本流; 中的终结点的顺序它将始终返回逻辑文本流顺序中的文本范围的开始和结束终结点之间的文本。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the string to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符串的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: Use `-1` if no limit is required.
trans-unit.target: 使用`-1`如果没有限制，则。

trans-unit.source: The plain text of the text range, possibly truncated at the specified maxLength.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围，可能截断在指定的纯文本 maxLength 。

trans-unit.source: If maxLength is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 maxLength 小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Moves the text range the specified number of text units.
trans-unit.target: 将移动文本范围指定数量的文本单位。

trans-unit.source: When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the Move method to execute successfully.
trans-unit.target: 需要遍历文本范围的内容时，为了让移动方法才能成功执行在幕后涉及一系列步骤。

trans-unit.source: The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint, which makes the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint superfluous.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围进行了规范化;也就是说，将文本范围折叠为退化范围，在<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点，这使得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点成为多余。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤是必需的文本范围跨越其中的情况下消除歧义`unit`边界; 例如，"{The U} RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com)文本中嵌入"位置"{"和"}"是文本范围端点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting range is moved backward in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A> to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 生成的范围中向后移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>到所请求的开头`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The range is moved forward or backward in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A> by the requested number of `unit` boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 该区域中向前或向后移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>的请求数`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 然后扩展范围从退化范围状态通过移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>一个所请求的终结点`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: ![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() The textual content (or inner text) of a text container and an embedded object, such as a hyperlink or table cell, is exposed as a single, continuous text stream in both the control view and the content view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree; object boundaries are ignored.
trans-unit.target: ![通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整")Move() 和 expandtoenclosingunit （） 的文本内容 （或内部文本） 的文本容器和嵌入的对象，如超链接或表格单元格，如何调整文本范围的示例作为单个连续文本流中的控件视图和内容视图公开[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树; 对象边界被忽略。

trans-unit.source: ![Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.")
trans-unit.target: ![跨的嵌入对象的文本范围。](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "跨嵌入对象的文本范围。")

trans-unit.source: Example of a text stream with embedded objects and their range spans Move respects both hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: 含有嵌入的对象以及它们的范围的文本流的示例跨移动方面这两个隐藏和可见文本。

trans-unit.source: Move defers to the next largest <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> supported if the given <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> is not supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 移动交下一个最大<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>支持的如果给定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>控件不支持。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below.
trans-unit.target: 下面列出的顺序，从最小单位到最大值。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> The text is not altered in any way, the text range just spans a different part of the text.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>- <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>- <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>- <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>- <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>- <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>-<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>文本不以任何方式更改、 文本范围只跨越不同部分的文本。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The text unit boundary.
trans-unit.target: 文本单位的边界。

trans-unit.source: The number of text units to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的文本单位数。

trans-unit.source: A positive value moves the text range forward, a negative value moves the text range backward, and 0 has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 正值表示向前移动文本范围、 负值则表示移动文本范围倒退了，和 0 不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The number of units actually moved.
trans-unit.target: 实际移动的单位数。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number requested if either of the new text range endpoints is greater than or less than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange*> endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 它可能小于请求移动数如果新的文本范围端点大于或小于比<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange*>终结点。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange*>

trans-unit.source: Moves one endpoint of a text range to the specified endpoint of a second text range.
trans-unit.target: 将文本范围的一个端点移动到第二个文本范围的指定端点。

trans-unit.source: If the endpoint being moved crosses the other endpoint of the same text range then that other endpoint is moved also, resulting in a degenerate range and ensuring the correct ordering of the endpoints (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> is always less than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>).
trans-unit.target: 如果要移动的终结点是跨相同的文本范围的其他终结点，则该其他终结点也会随，从而导致退化范围，并确保正确的顺序的终结点 (即，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>是否始终小于或等于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>)。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的端点。

trans-unit.source: Another range from the same text provider.
trans-unit.target: 从同一文本提供程序的另一个范围。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint on the other range.
trans-unit.target: 另一个范围终结点。

trans-unit.source: Moves one endpoint of the text range the specified number of text units within the document range.
trans-unit.target: 将文本范围指定的文档范围内的文本单位数的一个端点移动。

trans-unit.source: When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A> method to execute successfully.
trans-unit.target: 需要遍历文本范围的内容时，以便在后台涉及一系列步骤<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A>方法才能成功执行。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider.Move%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint, which makes the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint superfluous.
trans-unit.target: 文本范围进行了规范化;也就是说，将文本范围折叠为退化范围，在<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点，这使得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>终结点成为多余。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤是必需的文本范围跨越其中的情况下消除歧义`unit`边界; 例如，"{The U} RL [http://www.microsoft.com](http://www.microsoft.com)文本中嵌入"位置"{"和"}"是文本范围端点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting range is moved backward in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A> to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 生成的范围中向后移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>到所请求的开头`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.DocumentRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary.
trans-unit.target: 然后扩展范围从退化范围状态通过移动<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>一个所请求的终结点`unit`边界。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: ![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() MoveEndpointByUnit defers to the next largest <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> supported if the given <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> is not supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: ![通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过移动 & expandtoenclosingunit 进行的范围调整")（） 和 expandtoenclosingunit （) MoveEndpointByUnit 如何调整文本范围的示例将推迟到下一个最大<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>支持的如果给定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>控件不支持。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below.
trans-unit.target: 下面列出的顺序，从最小单位到最大值。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit> - <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的端点。

trans-unit.source: The textual unit for moving.
trans-unit.target: 移动文本单位。

trans-unit.source: The number of units to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的单位数。

trans-unit.source: A positive value moves the endpoint forward.
trans-unit.target: 正值表示向前移动端点。

trans-unit.source: A negative value moves backward.
trans-unit.target: 负值则表示向后移动。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 值 0 不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The number of units actually moved, which can be less than the number requested if moving the endpoint runs into the beginning or end of the document.
trans-unit.target: 实际移动的单位数，移动则可能小于请求如果端点时遇到的开头或末尾的文档。

trans-unit.source: Removes a highlighted section of text, corresponding to the caller's <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoints, from the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.
trans-unit.target: 删除与调用方的对应的文本突出显示的部分<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>终结点，从支持多个的文本容器中的突出显示文本集合不连续选择。

trans-unit.source: The text insertion point will move to the area of the removed highlight.
trans-unit.target: 文本插入点将移到删除突出显示的区域中。

trans-unit.source: Providing a degenerate text range will move the insertion point.
trans-unit.target: 提供退化文本范围将移动插入点。

trans-unit.source: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.SupportedTextSelection*> must have a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 如果文本提供程序不支持多个不连续选择 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.SupportedTextSelection*>的值必须<xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""> </xref>)。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.SupportedTextSelection*>

trans-unit.source: Causes the text control to scroll vertically until the text range is visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 导致文本控件垂直滚动，直到文本范围在视区中可见。

trans-unit.source: ScrollIntoView respects both hidden and visible text.
trans-unit.target: ScrollIntoView 尊重隐藏和显示文本。

trans-unit.source: If the text range is hidden, the text control will scroll only if the hidden text has an anchor in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 如果隐藏的文本范围，仅当隐藏的文本锚有视区中将滚动文本控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text control should be scrolled so the text range is flush with the top of the viewport; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it should be flush with the bottom of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文本控件应该滚动以便文本范围与视区; 顶部对齐<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果应该与视区底部对齐。

trans-unit.source: Highlights text in the text control corresponding to the text range <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref> endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示对应于文本范围的文本控件中的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint"></xref>终结点。

trans-unit.source: If a degenerate text range is provided, the text insertion point will move to the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint> endpoint of the text range.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供退化文本范围，则将将文本插入点移到<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>的文本范围的终结点。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when text selection is not supported by the text control.
trans-unit.target: 文本控件不支持文本选择时发生。
